mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, ANA_JOB_ID, ANA_STR_DTM, ANA_KND_CD, CS_ANA_CD, CS_ANA_DTLS, CS_ANA_STR_DTM, CS_ANA_END_DTM, IM_PL_CD, IM_PL_DTLS, IM_PL_STR_DTM, IM_PL_END_DTM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, ANA_JOB_ID, ANA_STR_DTM, ANA_KND_CD, CS_ANA_CD, CS_ANA_DTLS, CS_ANA_STR_DTM, CS_ANA_END_DTM, IM_PL_CD, IM_PL_DTLS, IM_PL_STR_DTM, IM_PL_END_DTM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{anaJobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{anaKndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csAnaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csAnaDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csAnaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{csAnaEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{imPlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imPlDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imPlStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{imPlEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO,
ANA_JOB_ID,
ANA_JOB_NM,
ANA_STR_DTM,
ANA_KND_CD,
CS_ANA_CD,
CS_ANA_CD_NM,
CS_ANA_DTLS,
CS_ANA_STR_DTM,
CS_ANA_END_DTM,
CS_ANA_IL_CD,
CS_ANA_IL_CD_NM,
IM_PL_CD,
IM_PL_CD_NM,
IM_PL_DTLS,
IM_PL_STR_DTM,
IM_PL_END_DTM,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}) ,
#{anaJobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaJobNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{anaKndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csAnaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csAnaCdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csAnaDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csAnaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{csAnaEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{csAnaIlCd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{csAnaIlCdNm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{imPlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imPlCdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imPlDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imPlStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{imPlEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR
ANA_JOB_ID = #{anaJobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANA_JOB_NM = #{anaJobNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANA_STR_DTM = #{anaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ANA_KND_CD = #{anaKndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_ANA_CD = #{csAnaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_ANA_CD_NM = #{csAnaCdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_ANA_DTLS = #{csAnaDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CS_ANA_STR_DTM = #{csAnaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CS_ANA_END_DTM = #{csAnaEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IM_PL_CD = #{imPlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IM_PL_CD_NM = #{imPlCdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IM_PL_DTLS = #{imPlDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IM_PL_STR_DTM = #{imPlStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IM_PL_END_DTM = #{imPlEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR set ANA_JOB_ID = #{anaJobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANA_STR_DTM = #{anaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ANA_KND_CD = #{anaKndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_ANA_CD = #{csAnaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_ANA_DTLS = #{csAnaDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CS_ANA_STR_DTM = #{csAnaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CS_ANA_END_DTM = #{csAnaEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IM_PL_CD = #{imPlCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IM_PL_DTLS = #{imPlDtls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IM_PL_STR_DTM = #{imPlStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IM_PL_END_DTM = #{imPlEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
update WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR A set A.VRF_CD = '4' --검증전 ,A.RVW_STS_CD = '0' --검토전 where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR A set (A.REG_TYP_CD , A.OBJ_VERS , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) = (select case when A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' then 'D' else case when MAX(B.ANA_JOB_ID) IS NULL then 'C' else 'U' end end ,case when max(B.OBJ_VERS) is null then 1 else max(B.OBJ_VERS) end as OBJ_VERS , NVL(MAX(B.FRS_RQST_DTM), A.RQST_DTM) as FRS_RQST_DTM , NVL(MAX(B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID), A.RQST_USER_ID) as FRS_RQST_USER_ID from WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR B where B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and B.ANA_JOB_ID = A.ANA_JOB_ID and B.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: and A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' --검증쿼리 and exists (select 1 from WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR D where D.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and nvl(A.CS_ANA_CD, '▦') = nvl(D.CS_ANA_CD, '▦') and nvl(A.CS_ANA_DTLS, '▦') = nvl(D.CS_ANA_DTLS, '▦') and nvl(A.CS_ANA_STR_DTM, '') = nvl(D.CS_ANA_STR_DTM, '') and nvl(A.CS_ANA_END_DTM, '') = nvl(D.CS_ANA_END_DTM, '') and nvl(A.IM_PL_CD, '▦') = nvl(D.IM_PL_CD, '▦') and nvl(A.IM_PL_DTLS, '▦') = nvl(D.IM_PL_DTLS, '▦') and nvl(A.IM_PL_STR_DTM, '') = nvl(D.IM_PL_STR_DTM, '') and nvl(A.IM_PL_END_DTM, '') = nvl(D.IM_PL_END_DTM, '') and nvl(A.OBJ_DESCN, '▦') = nvl(D.OBJ_DESCN, '▦') )

--검증쿼리 and exists (select 1 from WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR D INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR E on D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO and D.VRF_CD = '1' and D.RVW_STS_CD ='0' and E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' where 1=1 and A.ANA_JOB_ID = D.ANA_JOB_ID and A.ANA_STR_DTM = D.ANA_STR_DTM and A.ANA_KND_CD = D.ANA_KND_CD)
mapper.update: update WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR A set A.VRF_CD = (select case when nvl(MAX(B.RQST_SNO), 0) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '2' -- 1: 등록가능 2: 검증오류 END from WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS B where B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO and B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.ANA_JOB_ID, A.ANA_JOB_NM, A.ANA_STR_DTM, A.ANA_KND_CD, A.RQST_DCD
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.CS_ANA_CD, A.CS_ANA_CD_NM, A.CS_ANA_DTLS, A.CS_ANA_STR_DTM, A.CS_ANA_END_DTM, A.CS_ANA_IL_CD, A.CS_ANA_IL_CD_NM, A.IM_PL_CD, A.IM_PL_CD_NM, A.IM_PL_DTLS, A.IM_PL_STR_DTM, A.IM_PL_END_DTM, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , (CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END ) AS FontColor FROM WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.sql: , ANA_KND_CD, CS_ANA_CD, CS_ANA_CD_NM, CS_ANA_IL_CD, CS_ANA_IL_CD_NM , CS_ANA_DTLS, CS_ANA_STR_DTM, CS_ANA_END_DTM, IM_PL_CD, IM_PL_CD_NM , IM_PL_DTLS, IM_PL_STR_DTM, IM_PL_END_DTM , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATETIME , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR A SET (ANA_JOB_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.ANA_JOB_ID AS ANA_JOB_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR B WHERE B.ANA_JOB_ID = A.ANA_JOB_ID AND B.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR B WHERE B.ANA_JOB_ID = A.ANA_JOB_ID AND B.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.ANA_JOB_ID = A.ANA_JOB_ID AND B.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR SELECT ANA_JOB_ID, ANA_STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_CS_ANA_MSTR A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('U', 'D') AND B.ANA_JOB_ID = A.ANA_JOB_ID AND B.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_CS_ANA_MSTR SELECT A.ANA_JOB_ID AS ANA_JOB_ID , A.ANA_STR_DTM AS ANA_STR_DTM , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATETIME AS STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_CS_ANA_MSTR A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' --검증쿼리
and not exists (select 1 from WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR D where A.ANA_JOB_ID = D.ANA_JOB_ID and A.ANA_STR_DTM = D.ANA_STR_DTM and A.ANA_KND_CD = D.ANA_KND_CD)
mapper.select:
SELECT 'BR' AS ANA_KND_CD --업무규칙(프로파일은 별도로...) ,A.BR_NM AS ANA_JOB_NM --업무규칙명 ,A.BR_ID AS ANA_JOB_ID --업무규칙ID ,B.FULL_PATH AS BIZ_AREA_LNM --업무영역명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM --진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID --진단대상ID ,A.DBC_TBL_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM --테이블명 ,A.DBC_COL_NM AS DBC_COL_NM --컬럼명 ,D.DQI_ID AS DQI_ID --데이터품질지표ID ,DM.FULL_PATH AS DQI_LNM --데이터품질지표명 ,C.CTQ_ID AS CTQ_ID --중요정보항목ID ,CM.FULL_PATH AS CTQ_LNM --중요정보항목명 ,R.ANA_STR_DTM AS ANA_STR_DTM --최근측정일자 ,R.ANA_CNT AS ANA_CNT --분석건수 ,R.ER_CNT AS ER_CNT --오류건수 ,R.ERR_RATE AS ER_RATE --오류율 ,R.ANA_DGR --분석차수
,DECODE(R.ANA_DGR, NULL, '', R.ANA_DGR||' ') AS ANA_DGR_DISP --최근실행차수 ,A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID AS BR_CRGP_USER_ID --업무규칙담당자ID ,A.GL_NV AS GL_NV --목표치 ,A.AGR_NV --가중치 ,A.USE_YN --사용여부 ,A.OBJ_DESCN --설명
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(R.ER_CNT,R.ANA_CNT)), 2)) AS SIGMA ,CASE WHEN CS.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '#FF0000' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor ,CS.ANA_KND_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_CD_NM ,CS.CS_ANA_IL_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_IL_CD_NM ,CS.CS_ANA_DTLS ,CS.CS_ANA_STR_DTM ,CS.CS_ANA_END_DTM ,CS.IM_PL_CD ,CS.IM_PL_CD_NM ,CS.IM_PL_DTLS ,CS.IM_PL_STR_DTM ,CS.IM_PL_END_DTM ,CS.RQST_NO ,CS.RQST_SNO ,CS.OBJ_DESCN ,CS.OBJ_VERS ,CS.REG_TYP_CD ,CS.FRS_RQST_DTM ,CS.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,CS.RQST_DTM ,CS.RQST_USER_ID ,CS.APRV_DTM ,CS.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAM_BR_MSTR A INNER JOIN ( ) R ON A.BR_ID = R.BR_ID AND R.ER_CNT > 0 AND R.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP D ON A.BR_ID = D.BR_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DM ON D.DQI_ID = DM.DQI_ID AND DM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON A.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP C ON A.BR_ID = C.BR_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CM ON C.CTQ_ID = CM.CTQ_ID AND CM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DB ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = DB.DBC_TBL_NM AND A.DBC_COL_NM = DB.DBC_COL_NM LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR CS ON A.BR_ID = CS.ANA_JOB_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = CS.ANA_STR_DTM WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND R.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL AND R.ER_CNT > 0
AND DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DB.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DB.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DB.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DB.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (DB.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DB.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DB.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DB.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND B.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND DM.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CM.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{ctqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
ORDER BY R.ANA_DGR, R.ANA_STR_DTM, A.BR_NM
mapper.sql:
SELECT A.PRF_KND_CD AS ANA_KND_CD -- 프로파일 ,A.PRF_NM AS ANA_JOB_NM -- 프로파일명 ,A.PRF_ID AS ANA_JOB_ID -- 프로파일ID ,'' AS BIZ_AREA_LNM ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM -- 진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID -- 진단대상ID ,A.DBC_TBL_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM -- 테이블명 ,A.OBJ_NM AS DBC_COL_NM -- 컬럼명 ,D.DQI_ID AS DQI_ID -- 데이터품질지표ID ,DM.FULL_PATH AS DQI_LNM -- 데이터품질지표명 ,'' AS CTQ_ID -- 중요정보항목ID ,'' AS CTQ_LNM -- 중요정보항목명 ,R.ANA_STR_DTM AS ANA_STR_DTM -- 최근측정일자 ,R.ANA_CNT AS ANA_CNT -- 분석건수 ,R.ESN_ER_CNT AS ER_CNT -- 오류건수 ,R.ERR_RATE AS ER_RATE -- 오류율 ,R.ANA_DGR -- 분석차수 ,DECODE(R.ANA_DGR, NULL, '', R.ANA_DGR||' ') AS ANA_DGR_DISP --최근실행차수 ,A.RQST_USER_ID AS PRF_CRGP_USER_ID -- 업무규칙담당자ID ,NULL -- A.GL_NV AS GL_NV -- 목표치 ,NULL -- A.AGR_NV -- 가중치 ,A.USE_YN -- 사용여부 ,A.OBJ_DESCN -- 설명 ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(R.ESN_ER_CNT,R.ANA_CNT)), 2)) AS SIGMA ,CASE WHEN CS.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '#FF0000' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor ,CS.ANA_KND_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_CD_NM ,CS.CS_ANA_IL_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_IL_CD_NM ,CS.CS_ANA_DTLS ,CS.CS_ANA_STR_DTM ,CS.CS_ANA_END_DTM ,CS.IM_PL_CD ,CS.IM_PL_CD_NM ,CS.IM_PL_DTLS ,CS.IM_PL_STR_DTM ,CS.IM_PL_END_DTM ,CS.RQST_NO ,CS.RQST_SNO ,CS.OBJ_DESCN ,CS.OBJ_VERS ,CS.REG_TYP_CD ,CS.FRS_RQST_DTM ,CS.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,CS.RQST_DTM ,CS.RQST_USER_ID ,CS.APRV_DTM ,CS.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A INNER JOIN ( SELECT R.* , CASE WHEN R.ANA_CNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(R.ESN_ER_CNT*100/R.ANA_CNT,2) END AS ERR_RATE FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT R INNER JOIN (SELECT PRF_ID, MAX(ANA_STR_DTM) AS ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT GROUP BY PRF_ID ) R2 ON R.PRF_ID = R2.PRF_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = R2.ANA_STR_DTM ) R ON A.PRF_ID = R.PRF_ID AND R.ESN_ER_CNT > 0 AND R.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN WAM_PRF_DQI_MAP D ON A.PRF_ID = D.PRF_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DM ON D.DQI_ID = DM.DQI_ID AND DM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DB ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = DB.DBC_TBL_NM AND A.OBJ_NM = DB.DBC_COL_NM LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR CS ON A.PRF_ID = CS.ANA_JOB_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = CS.ANA_STR_DTM LEFT JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL WDT ON WDT.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND WDT.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID AND WDT.DBC_TBL_NM = A.DBC_TBL_NM LEFT JOIN WAT_DBC_COL WDC ON WDC.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID AND WDC.DBC_TBL_NM = A.DBC_TBL_NM AND WDC.DBC_COL_NM = A.OBJ_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = A.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND R.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL AND R.ESN_ER_CNT > 0
AND DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DB.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR A.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DB.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND (DB.DBC_COL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_COL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DB.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND CONCAT(GET_CMCD_DTL_NM("BIZ_AREA_CD",EX.BIZ_AREA_CD),">", GET_CMCD_DTL_NM("BIZ_AREA_DTL_CD",EX.BIZ_AREA_DTL_CD)) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND DM.FULL_PATH LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 1=2
AND A.PRF_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND R.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CR' AS ANA_KND_CD -- 검증룰 ,C.VRFC_NM AS ANA_JOB_NM -- 검증룰명 ,B.RULE_REL_ID AS ANA_JOB_ID -- 검증룰ID ,'' AS BIZ_AREA_LNM ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM -- 진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID -- 진단대상ID ,B.DBC_TBL_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM -- 테이블명 ,B.DBC_COL_NM AS DBC_COL_NM -- 컬럼명 ,DM.DQI_ID AS DQI_ID -- 데이터품질지표ID ,DM.FULL_PATH AS DQI_LNM -- 데이터품질지표명 ,'' AS CTQ_ID -- 중요정보항목ID ,'' AS CTQ_LNM -- 중요정보항목명 ,R.ANA_STR_DTM AS ANA_STR_DTM -- 최근측정일자 ,R.ANA_CNT AS ANA_CNT -- 분석건수 ,R.ESN_ER_CNT AS ER_CNT -- 오류건수 ,R.ERR_RATE AS ER_RATE -- 오류율 ,R.ANA_DGR -- 분석차수 ,DECODE(R.ANA_DGR, NULL, '', R.ANA_DGR||' ') AS ANA_DGR_DISP --최근실행차수 ,'' AS PRF_CRGP_USER_ID -- 업무규칙담당자ID ,NULL -- A.GL_NV AS GL_NV -- 목표치 ,NULL -- A.AGR_NV -- 가중치 ,'' AS USE_YN -- 사용여부 ,DM.OBJ_DESCN -- 설명 ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(R.ESN_ER_CNT,R.ANA_CNT)), 2)) AS SIGMA ,CASE WHEN CS.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '#FF0000' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor ,CS.ANA_KND_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_CD_NM ,CS.CS_ANA_IL_CD ,CS.CS_ANA_IL_CD_NM ,CS.CS_ANA_DTLS ,CS.CS_ANA_STR_DTM ,CS.CS_ANA_END_DTM ,CS.IM_PL_CD ,CS.IM_PL_CD_NM ,CS.IM_PL_DTLS ,CS.IM_PL_STR_DTM ,CS.IM_PL_END_DTM ,CS.RQST_NO ,CS.RQST_SNO ,CS.OBJ_DESCN ,CS.OBJ_VERS ,CS.REG_TYP_CD ,CS.FRS_RQST_DTM ,CS.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,CS.RQST_DTM ,CS.RQST_USER_ID ,CS.APRV_DTM ,CS.APRV_USER_ID FROM ( SELECT R.* , CASE WHEN R.ANA_CNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(R.ESN_ER_CNT*100/R.ANA_CNT,2) END AS ERR_RATE FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT R INNER JOIN (SELECT PRF_ID, MAX(ANA_STR_DTM) AS ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT GROUP BY PRF_ID ) R2 ON R.PRF_ID = R2.PRF_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = R2.ANA_STR_DTM ) R INNER JOIN WAA_COL_RULE_REL B ON R.PRF_ID = B.RULE_REL_ID INNER JOIN waa_vrfc_rule C ON B.VRFC_ID = C.VRFC_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DM ON DM.DQI_ID = C.DQI_ID AND DM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DB ON B.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID AND B.DBC_TBL_NM = DB.DBC_TBL_NM AND B.DBC_COL_NM = DB.DBC_COL_NM LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR CS ON R.PRF_ID = CS.ANA_JOB_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = CS.ANA_STR_DTM LEFT JOIN WAT_DBC_TBL WDT ON WDT.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND WDT.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID AND WDT.DBC_TBL_NM = B.DBC_TBL_NM LEFT JOIN WAT_DBC_COL WDC ON WDC.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID AND WDC.DBC_TBL_NM = B.DBC_TBL_NM AND WDC.DBC_COL_NM = B.DBC_COL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = B.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE 1 = 1 AND R.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL AND R.ESN_ER_CNT > 0
AND DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DB.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DB.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND (DB.DBC_COL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%') OR DB.DBC_COL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%') OR DB.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , '%'))
AND CONCAT(GET_CMCD_DTL_NM("BIZ_AREA_CD",EX.BIZ_AREA_CD),">", GET_CMCD_DTL_NM("BIZ_AREA_DTL_CD",EX.BIZ_AREA_DTL_CD)) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND DM.FULL_PATH LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND 1=2
AND B.VRFC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND A.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
